missions.title: Mission 1: Zara's First Move
missions.description: Make Zara move forward 1 step. Use the 'Move Forward' block 1 time.

missions.title: Mission 2: The Turning Point
missions.description: Move forward 1 step, turn right, then move forward 1 more step and turn left to reach the target.

missions.title: Mission 3: The Looping Path
missions.description: Use a 'Repeat' loop to make Zara move forward and turn right 4 times to complete a square path.

missions.title: Mission 4: The Sensor Challenge
missions.description: Program Zara to keep moving forward, but stop when the distance sensor detects an obstacle within 20cm.

missions.title: FINALE: Save the Lost Dino City!
missions.description: Navigate the maze: keep moving forward unless an obstacle is detected, then turn and continue moving forward.
